task.title: How to Subtract Numbers ?
task.shortdesc: Here are the instructions for using the subtraction feature of ABC calculator app

taskbody.prereq: You must know what is subtraction to successfully perform this operation.
taskbody.result: The result from the subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to subtract 2 from 5. The equation will appear as 5-2=3. Enter 5. Press minus. Enter 2. Press Equal. The result 3 appears on the screen.
